===================================================================
 Opeth is a Swedish heavy metal band that formed in 1990 in        
 Stockholm. While the band has been through several personnel      
 changes, singer, guitarist, and songwriter Mikael Ãƒâ€¦kerfeldt has   
 remained Opeth&#039;s driving force since joining shortly after its    
 inception.                                                        
                                                                   
 While firmly rooted in Scandinavian death metal, Opeth            
 incorporates progressive metal, progressive rock, folk, blues and 
 jazz into their usually lengthy songs. Many compositions include  
 acoustic guitars and strong dynamic shifts, as well as growling   
 and clean vocals. The band occasionaly played live to support the 
 first four albums, though later conducted its first world tour    
 after the release of 2001&#039;s Blackwater Park.                      
                                                                   
 Opeth has released eight studio albums, two live albums, one box  
 set, and a DVD. The band released its debut album Orchid in 1995, 
 after a year of delays, but did not experience commercial success 
 until the 2003 release Damnation, which debuted at number 192 on  
 the Billboard 200. The band&#039;s ninth studio album, Watershed, is   
 due for release on June 3, 2008.
